name: The Office Manager
description:
Hey! I'm your boss! And i'm in a little hiring frenzy.

I have decided to hire 1 to 3 employees every month.

Your job is to buy place in the office around your headquarters. But you also need to assign a desk at every new person.

Your Employees will need a Desk, but also a place to rest, and toilets.

Do you think you can handle that for... I dont know. 2 years?

Thanks Buddy. Good Luck!

--------------------

This is a game released for the Ludum Dare 42, in the Jam session.

This is a little disapointing. I was planning for an infinite mod, and it cost me 50% of the time and I wasn't able to finishing it in time. I hope you'll enjoy it anyway.

Cheers
